DOC.brief_summary: Observational study investigate circadian rhythm pattern
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Investigate Effects Rapid Transmeridian Travel
DOC.criteria: Ability acceptance provide write consent Men woman 1875 year Body Mass Index ≥ 18 ≤ 30 kg/m2 History ( within 12 month prior screen ) psychiatric disorder Major surgery , trauma , illness immobile 3 day within past month Pregnancy recent pregnancy ( within 6 week ) A positive test drug abuse screen visit Any sound medical reason determine clinical investigator
